response.original_title: Patrick Spicer: Who's This All of a Sudden
response.overview: Debut hour from one of the most exciting acts on the UK comedy circuit and one of the most pathetic cringing worms (as seen on The Mash Report (BBC2), BBC3 and Channel 4 Online.) Patrick will be recounting his deepest fears and humiliations in a funny and credible way (nominated for both Chortle Best Newcomer and Leicester Mercury Comedian of the Year). So if you've ever felt like there's something wrong with you, come and laugh with Patrick. If not, come and laugh at Patrick.
response.title: Patrick Spicer: Who's This All of a Sudden
